tasks.compile-all: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output dist/sendgrid-linux mod.ts && deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output dist/sendgrid-macos mod.ts && deno compile --allow-all --target aarch64-apple-darwin --output dist/sendgrid-macos-arm mod.ts
